728683f-a.title: Richmond: Chestnut Avenue - White Plains Avenue
728683f-a.text:
Chestnut Ave. (vantage point), north side, at White Plains Ave. (Rosebank). The view is northeastward along the tracks of the Staten Laland Railroad and shows the De Jonge paper factory (left), and the City garbage disposal plant (right). The factory is at the S.W. corner
of Tompkins and Greenfield Aves.
July 15, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
728683f-a.folder: Chestnut Avenue & White Plains Avenue, Staten Island, NY
